Package game.actors

Class Blacksmith

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.Blacksmith
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, MonologueAction
public class Blacksmith
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
implements MonologueAction
Represents a Blacksmith character in the game. The Blacksmith provides various functionalities like upgrading the player's items.

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Display display)
      Allows the Blacksmith to take a turn, but by default, Blacksmith doesn't do any action.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - list of available actions
      lastAction - the last action taken
      map - the game map
      display - the display in which the game is shown
      Returns:
      a new DoNothingAction

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map)
      Generates the actions the Blacksmith can perform on their turn.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - The actor that is in the proximity of the Blacksmith.
      direction - The direction from the Blacksmith to the otherActor.
      map - The map where the Blacksmith resides.
      Returns:
      The list of allowable actions for the Blacksmith.
